column1: Little Goat Diner////I highly recommend the Bulls Eye French Toast during brunch. I was starving on a Saturday morning and obviously not everywhere is open in the west loop
column2: but this one was! The waitress recommend this to me and it turned out to be the most creative French Toast I have ever had: imagine crispy fried chicken bites on top of soft maple-soaked french toast! I can't wait to going there a second time.
